title: Using Finite Binomial Series to Prove Results in Prime Numbers and Congruences
description:
reference: viXra:2211.0003v1
title: Using Finite Binomial Series to Prove Results in Prime Numbers and Congruences
authors: Shazly Abdullah
category: Number Theory
type: submission
date: 2022-11-01 00:56:47
abstract: In this work used an algebraic method that uses elementary algebra and binomial theorem to create finite binomial series.This is a type of series that has several properties in variables. We used these series to prove results in congruences and prime numbers.
